Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Gov. Bruce Rauner did not introduce balanced budgets every year.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Gov. Rauner's record of introducing balanced budgets.
Understate: No evidence suggests that the claim understates any information.
Falters at times: The claim falters by asserting that Gov. Rauner introduced balanced budgets every year, which is contradicted by evidence.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is evidence to the contrary.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Gov. Rauner introduced balanced budgets every year without sufficient evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide an alternative explanation.
